00257 inline bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::SetElementsCount(int count, const Element& value)
00258 {
00259        if (count <= MaxSize){
00260               for (int i = m_elementsCount; i < count; ++i){
00261                      m_elements[i] = value;
00262               }
00263 
00264               m_elementsCount = count;
00265 
00266               return true;
00267        }
00268        else{
00269               return false;
00270        }
00271 }

00275 inline bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::EnsureElementsCount(int count, const Element& value)
00276 {
00277        if (count <= MaxSize){
00278               if (m_elementsCount < count){
00279                      for (int i = m_elementsCount; i < count; ++i){
00280                             m_elements[i] = value;
00281                      }
00282 
00283                      m_elementsCount = count;
00284               }

00333 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00334 inline void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::Translate(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector)
00335 {
00336        int commonSize = istd::Min(m_elementsCount, vector.m_elementsCount);
00337        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00338               m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i];
00339        }

00343 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00344 inline void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::ScaledCumulate(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector, Element scale)
00345 {
00346        if (m_elementsCount < vector.m_elementsCount){
00347               int i = 0;
00348               for (; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00349                      m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i] * scale;
00350               }
00351 
00352               for (; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00353                      m_elements[i] = vector.m_elements[i] * scale;
00354               }
00355 
00356               m_elementsCount = vector.m_elementsCount;
00357        }
00358        else{
00359               for (int i = 0; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00360                      m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i] * scale;
00361               }
00362        }
00363 }

00366 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00367 void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::SetElementsFrom(const TFastVector& vector, const Element& expansionValue)
00368 {
00369        int commonSize = istd::Min(m_elementsCount, vector.m_elementsCount);
00370 
00371        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00372               SetElement(i, vector[i]);
00373        }
00374 
00375        for (int i = commonSize; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00376               SetElement(i, expansionValue);
00377        }
00378 }

00404 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00405 inline Element TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::GetDotProduct(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector) const
00406 {
00407        Element retVal = 0.0;
00408 
00409        int commonSize = istd::Min(m_elementsCount, vector.m_elementsCount);
00410        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00411               retVal +=  m_elements[i] * vector.m_elements[i];
00412        }
00413 
00414        return retVal;
00415 }

00449 inline bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::operator==(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector) const
00450 {
00451        if (m_elementsCount != vector.m_elementsCount){
00452               return false;
00453        }
00454 
00455        for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00456               if (m_elements[i] != vector.m_elements[i]){
00457                      return false;
00458               }
00459        }
00460 
00461        return true;
00462 }

00472 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00473 bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::operator<(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector) const
00474 {
00475        int commonSize = istd::Min(m_elementsCount, vector.m_elementsCount);
00476        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00477               if (m_elements[i] > vector.m_elements[i]){
00478                      return false;
00479               }
00480               else if (m_elements[i] < vector.m_elements[i]){
00481                      return true;
00482               }
00483        }
00484 
00485        return m_elementsCount < vector.m_elementsCount;
00486 }

00555 inline TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::operator+=(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector)
00556 {
00557        if (m_elementsCount < vector.m_elementsCount){
00558               int i = 0;
00559               for (; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00560                      m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i];
00561               }
00562 
00563               for (; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00564                      m_elements[i] = vector.m_elements[i];
00565               }
00566 
00567               m_elementsCount = vector.m_elementsCount;
00568        }
00569        else{
00570               for (int i = 0; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00571                      m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i];
00572               }
00573        }
00574 
00575        return *this;

00579 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00580 inline TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::operator-=(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector)
00581 {
00582        if (m_elementsCount < vector.m_elementsCount){
00583               int i = 0;
00584               for (; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00585                      m_elements[i] -= vector.m_elements[i];
00586               }
00587 
00588               for (; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00589                      m_elements[i] = -vector.m_elements[i];
00590               }
00591 
00592               m_elementsCount = vector.m_elementsCount;
00593        }
00594        else{
00595               for (int i = 0; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00596                      m_elements[i] -= vector.m_elements[i];
00597               }
00598        }
00599 
00600        return *this;

00705 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00706 Element TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::GetElementsSum() const
00707 {
00708        Element retVal = 0;
00709 
00710        for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00711         retVal += m_elements[i];
00712     }
00713

00718 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00719 bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::Normalize(Element length)
00720 {
00721     Element isLength = GetLength();
00722 
00723     Element proportion = isLength / length;
00724 
00725        if (::fabs(proportion) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00726               for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00727             m_elements[i] = m_elements[i] / proportion;
00728         }
00729 
00730               return true;
00731     }
00732        else{
00733               return false;
00734        }
00735 }

00740 {
00741        result = *this;
00742 
00743        return result.Normalize(length);
00744 }

00747 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00748 void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::GetMinimal(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector, TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& result) const
00749 {
00750        int elementsCount = istd::Min(GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00751 
00752        result.SetElementsCount(elementsCount);
00753 
00754        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00755               result.SetElement(i, istd::Min(GetElement(i), vector.GetElement(i)));
00756        }
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00761 void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::GetMaximal(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector, TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& result) const
00762 {
00763        int elementsCount = istd::Min(GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00764 
00765        result.SetElementsCount(elementsCount);
00766 
00767        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00768               result.SetElement(i, istd::Max(GetElement(i), vector.GetElement(i)));
00769        }
00770 }
00771 
00772 
00773 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00774 bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00775 {
00776        bool retVal = true;
00777 
00778        static iser::CArchiveTag elementsTag("Elements", "List of vector element");
00779        static iser::CArchiveTag elementTag("Element", "Single vector element");
00780 
00781        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(elementsTag, elementTag, m_elementsCount);
00782 
00783        if (!retVal || (m_elementsCount > MaxSize)){
00784               if (!archive.IsStoring()){
00785                      m_elementsCount = 0;
00786               }
00787 
00788               return false;
00789        }
00790 
00791     for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00792               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(elementTag);
00793               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_elements[i]);
00794               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(elementTag);
00795        }
00796 
00797        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(elementsTag);
00798 
00799        return retVal;
00800 }
